mapper.select: SELECT T1.TID , T1.TNM , T1.TDESC , T1.SNAME , T1.SMAIL , T1.SID , T1.EMAIL_SUBJECT , T1.CONTENTS_PATH , T1.CONTENTS_TYP , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C109' AND CD = T1.CONTENTS_TYP) CONTENTS_TYP_NM , T1.ATTCH_CNT , T1.RECV_CHK_YN , T1.USER_ID , T6.USER_NM , T1.DEPT_NO , T5.DEPT_NM , T1.USE_YN , T1.STATUS , T1.EAI_CAMP_NO , T1.REG_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM NEO_USER WHERE USER_ID = T1.REG_ID) REG_NM , T1.REG_DT , T1.UP_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM NEO_USER WHERE USER_ID = T1.UP_ID) UP_NM , T1.UP_DT , T1.WORK_STATUS , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TS_SECUAPPROVAL_LINE WHERE TID = T1.TID) = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END APPROVAL_LINE_YN , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TS_SECUAPPROVAL_LINE WHERE TID = T1.TID AND RSLT_CD >= '002') = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END APPROVAL_PROC_YN , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TS_SECUAPPROVAL_LINE WHERE TID = T1.TID AND RSLT_CD = '002') = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END APPROVAL_PROC_APP_YN , T8.ORG_KOR_NM FROM TS_SERVICETYP T1,NEO_USERORG_MAPP T7, V_NEO_ORGANIZATION T8,NEO_DEPT T5, NEO_USER T6 WHERE TID = #{tid} AND T1.USER_ID = T7.USER_ID AND T7.ORG_CD = T8.ORG_CD AND T1.DEPT_NO = T5.DEPT_NO AND T1.USER_ID = T6.USER_ID
SELECT CURRENT_VALUE FROM SYS.SEQUENCES WHERE NAME = 'TS_SERVICE_TID_SEQ'
SELECT T1.TID , T1.TNM , T1.USE_YN , T1.STATUS , T1.EAI_CAMP_NO FROM TS_SERVICETYP T1 WHERE EAI_CAMP_NO = #{eaiCampNo}
SELECT ATT_NO , SOURCE_URL , SECU_ATT_YN , SECU_ATT_TYP , REG_ID , REG_DT , UP_ID , UP_DT FROM TS_WEBAGENT WHERE TID = #{tid}

SELECT TID , ATT_NO , ATT_NM , ATT_FL_PATH , ATT_FL_SIZE , ATT_FL_TY , ENCRYPT_YN , ENCRYPT_TY , ENCRYPT_KEY , USE_YN , REG_ID , REG_DT , UP_ID , UP_DT FROM TS_ATTACH WHERE TID = #{tid} ORDER BY ATT_NO
SELECT CURRENT_VALUE FROM SYS.SEQUENCES WHERE NAME = 'MID_SEQ'

SELECT MID , SUBID , TID , RID , RNAME , RMAIL , ENCKEY , MAP1 , MAP2 , MAP3 , MAP4 , MAP5 , MAP6 , MAP7 , MAP8 , MAP9 , MAP10 , MAP11 , MAP12 , MAP13 , MAP14 , MAP15 FROM TS_RECIPIENTINFO T1 WHERE MID = #{mid} AND SUBID = #{subid} AND TID = #{tid} AND RID = #{rid}

SELECT MID , SUBID , TID , SPOS , SNAME , SMAIL , SID , RPOS , QUERY , CTNPOS , SUBJECT , CONTENTS , CDATE , SDATE , STATUS , DBCODE , REFMID , CHARSET , ATTACHFILE01 , ATTACHFILE02 , ATTACHFILE03 , ATTACHFILE04 , ATTACHFILE05 , DEPT_NO , RTY_MID , RTY_SUBID , RTY_TYP FROM TS_MAILQUEUE T1 WHERE MID = #{mid} AND SUBID = #{subid} AND TID = #{tid}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RID , RNAME , RMAIL , SUBID , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TS_RESULTLOG WHERE MID = T1.MID AND SUBID = T1.SUBID AND RCODE = '1') SUCC_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TS_RESULTLOG WHERE MID = T1.MID AND SUBID = T1.SUBID AND RCODE != '1') FAIL_CNT , (SELECT TOP 1 Y.CD_DESC FROM TS_RESULTLOG X, TS_RCODE Y WHERE X.MID = T1.MID AND X.SUBID = T1.SUBID AND X.RCODE != '1' AND X.RCODE = Y.RCODE ) FAIL_DESC , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUBID) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_COUNT FROM TS_RECIPIENTINFO T1 WHERE MID = #{mid} ) SRC WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows}

SELECT T1.TID , T1.APPR_STEP , T1.APPR_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM NEO_USER WHERE USER_ID = T1.APPR_USER_ID) APPR_USER_NM , T1.ORG_CD , (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(T7.ORG_KOR_NM), 'NONE') FROM V_NEO_ORGANIZATION T7 WHERE T7.ORG_CD = T3.ORG_CD) ORG_NM , T1.POSITION_GB , T1.JOB_GB , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C105' AND CD = T1.JOB_GB) JOB_NM , T1.APPR_DT , T1.RSLT_CD , (SELECT CASE WHEN CD = '000' THEN '' ELSE CD_NM END FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C103' AND CD = T1.RSLT_CD) RSLT_NM , T1.REJECT_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C104' AND CD = T1.REJECT_CD) REJECT_NM , T1.REG_ID , T1.REG_DT , T1.UP_DT FROM NEO_USER T2 INNER JOIN TS_SECUAPPROVAL_LINE T1 ON (T2.USER_ID = T1.APPR_USER_ID AND T1.TID = #{tid}) LEFT OUTER JOIN NEO_USERORG_MAPP T3 ON (T2.USER_ID = T3.USER_ID ) ORDER BY T1.APPR_STEP
mapper.update: UPDATE TS_SECUAPPROVAL_LINE SET RSLT_CD = '001' WHERE TID = #{tid} AND APPR_STEP = #{apprStep} + 1
mapper.select: SELECT APPR_USER_ID FROM TS_SECUAPPROVAL_LINE WHERE TID = #{tid} AND APPR_STEP = 1

SELECT T1.TID , T1.APPR_STEP , T1.APPR_USER_ID , T2.USER_NM APPR_USER_NM , T1.ORG_CD , T3.ORG_KOR_NM ORG_NM , T1.RSLT_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C103' AND CD = T1.RSLT_CD) RSLT_NM , T1.REJECT_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C104' AND CD = T1.REJECT_CD) REJECT_NM , T1.UP_DT , T1.REG_ID , COUNT(*) TOTAL_COUNT FROM TS_SECUAPPROVAL_LINE T1, NEO_USER T2, V_NEO_ORGANIZATION T3 WHERE T1.TID = #{tid} AND T1.APPR_USER_ID = T2.USER_ID AND T1.ORG_CD = T3.ORG_CD ORDER BY T1.APPR_STEP

SELECT T1.TID , T1.APPR_STEP , T1.APPR_USER_ID , T2.USER_NM APPR_USER_NM , T1.ORG_CD , T3.ORG_KOR_NM ORG_NM , T1.RSLT_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C103' AND CD = T1.RSLT_CD) RSLT_NM , T1.REJECT_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C104' AND CD = T1.REJECT_CD) REJECT_NM , T1.UP_DT , T1.REG_ID , COUNT(*) TOTAL_COUNT FROM TS_SECUAPPROVAL_LINE T1, NEO_USER T2, V_NEO_ORGANIZATION T3 WHERE T1.TID = #{tid} AND T1.APPR_USER_ID = T2.USER_ID AND T1.ORG_CD = T3.ORG_CD ORDER BY T1.APPR_STEP
